text: Alice Marie von Hildebrand, GCSG (11 March 1923 â€“ 14 January 2022) was a Belgian-born American Catholic philosopher, theologian, author, and professor. She was born in Brussels, Belgium. She taught at Hunter College. Von Hildebrand retired in 1984. She made more than 80 appearances on EWTN television programming. Von Hildebrand died from a short-illness on 14 January 2022, at her home in New Rochelle, New York, at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belgian philosophers Category:Belgian academics Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American philosophers Category:American theologians Category:Academics from New York City Category:Writers from Brussels
title: Alice von Hildebrand
